name: Rx
tuning: D# G# C# F# A# D#

content.text:
The riff, that reocours throughout the song goes like this

d#-------|
A#-------|
F#-------|
C#----0--|
G#-0h2---|
D#-------|

[Intro]
[ch]Em[/ch] - [ch]G[/ch] - [ch]D[/ch] - [ch]A[/ch]
[ch]Em[/ch] - [ch]G[/ch] - [ch]D[/ch] - [ch]A[/ch]

[Verse 1]

[ch]Em[/ch]
Wake up to a cloudy day
[ch]G[/ch]
Dark rolls in and it starts to rain
[ch]D[/ch]
Staring out to the cage-like walls
[ch]A[/ch]
Time goes by and the shadows crawl
[ch]Em[/ch]
Crushin' Candy Crush-ing pills
[ch]G[/ch]
Got no job, mom pays my bills
[ch]D[/ch]
Textin', Nexus, get my feels
[ch]A[/ch]
Sweatin' bullets, Netflix-chills
[ch]Em[/ch]
World's out there singin' the blues
[ch]G[/ch]
Twenty more dead on the evening news
[ch]D[/ch]
Think to myself: "really, what's the use?"
[ch]A[/ch]
I'm just like you, I was born to lose

[Pre-Chorus 1]
[ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Why oh why can't you just fix me?
[ch]D[/ch]
When all I want's to feel numb
[ch]A[/ch]
But the medication's all gone
[ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
Why oh why does God hate me?
[ch]D[/ch]
When all I want's to get high
[ch]A[/ch]
And forget this so-called life

[Chorus]
[ch]Em[/ch]
I am so frickin' bored
[ch]G[/ch]
Nothing to do today
[ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]A[/ch]
I guess I'll sit around and medicate (I medicate)
[ch]Em[/ch]
I am so frickin' bored
[ch]G[/ch]
Nothing to do today
[ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]A[/ch]
I guess I'll sit around and medicate (I medicate)

[Verse 2]
[ch]Em[/ch]
Can't wait to feel better than I ever will
[ch]G[/ch]
Attack that shit like a kid on Benadryl
[ch]D[/ch]
Chase it down with a hopeful smile
[ch]A[/ch]
Hate myself, if I can go for miles
[ch]Em[/ch]
They say family is all you need
[ch]G[/ch]
Someone to trust can help you breathe
[ch]D[/ch]
Inhale that drug, but you start to choke
[ch]A[/ch]
You follow the outs of an inside joke

[Pre-Chorus 2]
[ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Why oh why can't you just fix me?
[ch]D[/ch]
When all I want's to feel numb
[ch]A[/ch]
But the medication's all gone
[ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
Why oh why does God hate me?
[ch]D[/ch]                                                 [ch]A[/ch]
Cause I've seen enough of it, heard enough of it, felt enough of it

I've had enough of it

[Chorus]
[ch]Em[/ch]
I am so frickin' bored
[ch]G[/ch]
Nothing to do today
[ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]A[/ch]
I guess I'll sit around and medicate (I medicate)
[ch]Em[/ch]
I am so frickin' bored
[ch]G[/ch]
Nothing to do today
[ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]A[/ch]
I guess I'll sit around and medicate


[Refrain]
[ch]C[/ch]
Medicate
[ch]A[/ch]
Medicate
[ch]C[/ch]
Medicate
[ch]A[/ch]
Medicate

[ch]Em[/ch] - [ch]G[/ch] - [ch]D[/ch] - [ch]A[/ch]

[Bridge]
[ch]Em[/ch]
Superman is a hero
[ch]G[/ch]
But only when his mind is clear though
[ch]D[/ch]
He needs that fix like the rest of us
[ch]A[/ch]
So he's got no fear when he saves that bus
[ch]Em[/ch]
All the stars in the Hollywood Hills
[ch]G[/ch]
Snapchat Live while they pop them pills
[ch]D[/ch]
All those flavors of the rainbow

[ch]A[/ch]
Too bad that shit don't work though

[Post-Bridge]
[ch]Em[/ch]
Your friends are high right now
[ch]G[/ch]
Your parents are high right now
[ch]D[/ch]
That hot chick's high right now
[ch]A[/ch]
That cop is high right now
[ch]Em[/ch]
The president's high right now
[ch]G[/ch]
Your priest is high right now
[ch]D[/ch]
Everyone's high as fuck right now
A                             (A)
And no one's ever coming down

[Chorus]
[ch]Em[/ch]
I am so frickin' bored
[ch]G[/ch]
Nothing to do today
[ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]A[/ch]
I guess I'll sit around and medicate (I medicate)
[ch]Em[/ch]
I am so frickin' bored
[ch]G[/ch]
Nothing to do today
[ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]A[/ch]
I guess I'll sit around and medicate

[Refrain]
[ch]Em[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
Medicate
[ch]D[/ch]       [ch]A[/ch]
Medicate
[ch]Em[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
Medicate
[ch]D[/ch]       [ch]A[/ch]
Medicate

[ch]Em[/ch] - [ch]G[/ch] - [ch]D[/ch] - [ch]A[/ch]

[Outro]
      [ch]Em[/ch] - [ch]G[/ch] - [ch]D[/ch] - [ch]A[/ch]
I medicate

name: G2G
tuning: D# G# C# F# A# D#

content.text:
This is a hypothetical acoustic version of "G2G" that I think is fun to play.
Tuning: half-step down

I named the chords as follows, even though they're not really these chords because of tuning:
D#|------3--------0---2---2--------------------------------------1--|
A#|------0---3----2---3---2-----2------7----8-----10-----3---5---1--|
F#|--5---0---4----2---2---2-----3------7----9-----11-----3---5---2--|
C#|--5---0---4----2---0---4-----2------7----9-----11-----3---5---3--|
G#|--5---2---2----0-------4------------5----7-----9------1---3---3--|
D#|--3---3----------------2--------------------------------------1--|
   [ch]Gsus[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]Bm[/ch]   [ch]A[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]C#m6[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]*   [ch]Em[/ch]*   [ch]F#m[/ch]*   [ch]A#[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]*  [ch]F[/ch]
                                       ^In the chorus, I think it sounds better to play some chords like so.
                                        I guess you could play all the chords higher on the fret board like
                                        this if you want some consistency. Up to you.
 
Enjoy
-gladly

[Intro]
[ch]Gsus[/ch]  [ch]A[/ch]  [ch]Bm[/ch]
[ch]Em[/ch]*  [ch]D[/ch]*      [ch]F#m[/ch]*  [ch]D[/ch]*
[ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]Bm[/ch]
[ch]Em[/ch]*  [ch]D[/ch]*      [ch]F#m[/ch]*  [ch]D[/ch]*
[ch]F#m[/ch]  
[ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]F#m[/ch] (4x)  

[Verse]
[ch]G[/ch]             [ch]Bm[/ch]      [ch]F#m[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
    Southpaw taylor; sewing light.
           [ch]Bm[/ch]     [ch]F#m[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]
Light you swallow so it shines,
          [ch]Bm[/ch]    [ch]F#m[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]Bm[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]
from your ears horns of yellow, glow of white.

[Pre-chorus]
[ch]G[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch]   [ch]Bm[/ch]
        We are the stress-keepers.
[ch]G[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch]   [ch]Bm[/ch]
        We are the punchingtons.
[ch]G[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch]   [ch]Bm[/ch]                   [ch]A[/ch]     [ch]C#m6[/ch]
        Ready the mercurial flow,
Glow!

[Chorus]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                          [ch]Em[/ch]*  [ch]D[/ch]*
    My silly girl, I stayed too long.
         [ch]F#m[/ch]* [ch]D[/ch]*         [ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]A[/ch]       [ch]Bm[/ch]
I said "Come here my darling,    it all belongs to you."
[ch]Bm[/ch]                          [ch]Em[/ch]*  [ch]D[/ch]
Queen of mirth, you played your part.
     [ch]F#m[/ch]* [ch]D[/ch]*
You wanna be the storm, then be the storm.

[ch]F#m[/ch]  
[ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]F#m[/ch] (4x) 

[Verse]
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Bm[/ch]      [ch]F#m[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]
    Tragic rover, space time clover. 
       [ch]Bm[/ch]     [ch]F#m[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
I got secret power in tow.
        [ch]Bm[/ch]     [ch]F#m[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]
Silver miner, ashtray writer; 
             [ch]Bm[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]
give them strife and let them settle.

[Pre-chorus]
[ch]G[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch]   [ch]Bm[/ch] 
        We are the gate-keepers.
[ch]G[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch]   [ch]Bm[/ch] 
        We are the kickingtons.
[ch]G[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch]   [ch]Bm[/ch]               [ch]A[/ch]    [ch]C#m6[/ch]
        We got our own style.
Glow!

[Chorus]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                          [ch]Em[/ch]*  [ch]D[/ch]*
    My silly girl I stayed too long.
         [ch]F#m[/ch]* [ch]D[/ch]*         [ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]A[/ch]       [ch]Bm[/ch]
I said "Come here my darling,    it all belongs to you."
[ch]Bm[/ch]                           [ch]Em[/ch]*  [ch]D[/ch]
My queen of mirth, I strayed too far.
     [ch]F#m[/ch]* [ch]D[/ch]*                 [ch]F[/ch]
You wanna be the storm, then be the storm.

[Bridge]
[ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]A#[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]* [ch]D[/ch]* 

[Chorus]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                          [ch]Em[/ch]*  [ch]D[/ch]*
    My silly girl I stayed too long.
         [ch]F#m[/ch]* [ch]D[/ch]*         [ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]A[/ch]       [ch]Bm[/ch]
I said "Come here my darling,    it all belongs to you."
[ch]Bm[/ch]                                      [ch]D[/ch]*
You little blue thunder, I strayed too far.
[ch]D[/ch]*   [ch]F#m[/ch]* [ch]D[/ch]* 
You wanna be the storm, then be the storm.

[Outro]
[ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]Bm[/ch]     [ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]*  [ch]F#m[/ch]* [ch]D[/ch]* 

[ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]                          [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]Bm[/ch]     
       throw it away like anything that you don't need.

(It's far away)

Just the chords to the song as interpreted by me.
I don't own the rights to the song or anything, but you all knew that.
______________________________________
|My Lonesome Only Friend - Rx Bandits|
**************************************
In the ([ch]Am[/ch]) middle of a moment
in the ([ch]Dm[/ch]) dark of a dream
with the ([ch]E[/ch]) focus of a fool
you could ([ch]Am[/ch]) tell me anything

there's a ([ch]Am[/ch]) reason for deceit
in the ([ch]Dm[/ch]) chaos that I covet
try to ([ch]E[/ch]) find myself
before ([ch]Am[/ch]) I start to loathe it

([ch]Dm[/ch])No I can't just-a ([ch]G[/ch]) let you run
I never ([ch]E[/ch]) knew such sorrow as the
([ch]F[/ch])set-([ch]F[/ch])-ting ([ch]F[/ch]) sun
and ([ch]C[/ch]) Oh I take my last ([ch]Am[/ch]) breath
my ([ch]E[/ch]) Lonesome ([ch]B[/ch]) only ([ch]Am[/ch]) Friend

AH give me ([ch]Am[/ch]) what I please
the de-([ch]Dm[/ch])-sire to be free
just to ([ch]E[/ch]) stop all the pain
and the ([ch]Am[/ch]) shivering

([ch]Am[/ch]) No I Can't seem to let it go
([ch]Dm[/ch]) Truth now leaks like a lie
([ch]E[/ch]) I know you tried to save me baby but
([ch]Am[/ch]) you just ran out of time

([ch]Dm[/ch])No I can't see my ([ch]G[/ch]) self astray
I feel the ([ch]E[/ch]) emptiness at the first
([ch]F[/ch]) light ([ch]F[/ch]) of ([ch]F[/ch]) day
and ([ch]C[/ch]) Oh I take my last ([ch]Am[/ch]) breath
my ([ch]E[/ch]) Lonesome ([ch]B[/ch]) only ([ch]Am[/ch]) Friend

[SOLO chords]
[ch]Am[/ch] [ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]
[ch]Am[/ch]

([ch]Dm[/ch])I try to run but I can ([ch]G[/ch]) only crawl
every ([ch]E[/ch]) time I stand, I slip and
([ch]F[/ch]) sure-([ch]F[/ch])-ly ([ch]F[/ch]) fall
and ([ch]C[/ch]) Oh I take my last ([ch]Am[/ch]) breath
my ([ch]E[/ch]) Lonesome ([ch]B[/ch]) only ([ch]Am[/ch]) Friend

[ch]B[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] x4

Jamie Peacock

[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch] 
Couldn't see the moon
[ch]C#m[/ch]
When she came tonight
[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch]	[ch]C#m[/ch]
Emptiness inside her filled my room
[ch]F#m[/ch]		[ch]G#m[/ch]
I know its only distance 
[ch]B[/ch]		[ch]C#m[/ch]
But its feels just like the end
[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch]	[ch]C#m[/ch]
I won't ask this same old question

[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch]	[ch]C#m[/ch]
Adamant resistance to my lasting desires
[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch]	[ch]C#m[/ch]
Searching for an explanation to why I sleep alone
[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch]	
Oh I'm not darling anymore 
[ch]B[/ch]	[ch]C#m[/ch]
If you call you just use my name
[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch]
Let these clenched fists open wide to see 
[ch]A[/ch]	[ch]B[/ch]
Where all the answers lie

[ch]E[/ch]
Looking for a sign that I'm still alive 
[ch]E[/ch]
With these pilled up smiles 
[ch]E[/ch]
And these sloppy eyes yeah
[ch]C#m[/ch]	[ch]A[/ch]	[ch]B[/ch]	[ch]A[/ch]
Oh isn't that the truth? 
[ch]E[/ch]
And all the hollow whisperings 
[ch]E[/ch]
From between your sheets
[ch]E[/ch]
All the maybes in the world

Pray its over soon
[ch]C#m[/ch]
Never slept so soundly 
[ch]G#m[/ch]	[ch]F#m[/ch]
Than with your breath on my neck

[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch]
The Present has no future
[ch]C#m[/ch]
The future has no past
[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch]
The past is just a graveyard

For the lonely ghost regret
[ch]F#m[/ch]	[ch]G#m[/ch]
It's so hard to say good-bye

When I shake too much to hold

Let this blood within me run

Looking for a sign that Im still alive
[ch]E[/ch]
With this junky smile and these sloppy eyes Yeah

Finding our directions

                 [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]Cm[/ch]

                          [ch]Gm[/ch]  [ch]Cm[/ch]

                [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]Cm[/ch]

               [ch]Gm[/ch]  [ch]Cm[/ch]

                   [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]Cm[/ch]
